titleStmt.title: A Farther account from several letters of the continuation of the cruel persecution of the people called Quakers in Bristol, without regard to age or sex with copies of several warrants, by which some of them were committed.

notesStmt.note: Errors in paging: pages 3 and 6 misnumbered 2 and 1.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
